page.title: 02GREAT SAMPFORD SCHOOL
page.content: The school holds sbout eighty children.There are three classrooms,Infants,Lower Juniors and Upper Juniors.The Upper Juniors are in the main building.Also in the main building there is a staffroom,two cloakrooms and a hall.There is a separate toilet block in the playground.The school has a computer. It is a BBC computer.Ithas a disc drive as well.There is a 22" television set inthe school.We have a good collection of musical instrumentsand we took part in the music festival with other schools.Our football team is brilliant.We won the football trophy against other schools.We now have a sort of cafeteria system where we can choose our own meals.Every year we go on a school journey.In 1985 we went to Cromer.
